00019 #ifndef __MSC_H__
00020 #define __MSC_H__
00021 
00022 
00023 #if defined   (  __GNUC__  )
00024 #define __packed __attribute__((__packed__))
00025 #endif
00026 
00027 
00028 /* MSC Subclass Codes */
00029 #define MSC_SUBCLASS_RBC                0x01
00030 #define MSC_SUBCLASS_SFF8020I_MMC2      0x02
00031 #define MSC_SUBCLASS_QIC157             0x03
00032 #define MSC_SUBCLASS_UFI                0x04
00033 #define MSC_SUBCLASS_SFF8070I           0x05
00034 #define MSC_SUBCLASS_SCSI               0x06
00035 
00036 /* MSC Protocol Codes */
00037 #define MSC_PROTOCOL_CBI_INT            0x00
00038 #define MSC_PROTOCOL_CBI_NOINT          0x01
00039 #define MSC_PROTOCOL_BULK_ONLY          0x50
00040 
00041 
00042 /* MSC Request Codes */
00043 #define MSC_REQUEST_RESET               0xFF
00044 #define MSC_REQUEST_GET_MAX_LUN         0xFE
00045 
00046 
00047 /* MSC Bulk-only Stage */
00048 #define MSC_BS_CBW                      0       /* Command Block Wrapper */
00049 #define MSC_BS_DATA_OUT                 1       /* Data Out Phase */
00050 #define MSC_BS_DATA_IN                  2       /* Data In Phase */
00051 #define MSC_BS_DATA_IN_LAST             3       /* Data In Last Phase */
00052 #define MSC_BS_DATA_IN_LAST_STALL       4       /* Data In Last Phase with Stall */
00053 #define MSC_BS_CSW                      5       /* Command Status Wrapper */
00054 #define MSC_BS_ERROR                    6       /* Error */
00055 
00056 
00057 /* Bulk-only Command Block Wrapper */
00058 #if defined     (  __CC_ARM  )
00059 typedef __packed struct _MSC_CBW {
00060 #elif defined   (  __GNUC__  )
00061 typedef struct __packed _MSC_CBW {
00062 #elif defined   (  __IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__  )
00063 typedef __packed struct _MSC_CBW {
00064 #endif
00065   uint32_t dSignature;
00066   uint32_t dTag;
00067   uint32_t dDataLength;
00068   uint8_t  bmFlags;
00069   uint8_t  bLUN;
00070   uint8_t  bCBLength;
00071   uint8_t  CB[16];
00072 } MSC_CBW;
00073 
00074 /* Bulk-only Command Status Wrapper */
00075 #if defined     (  __CC_ARM  )
00076 typedef __packed struct _MSC_CSW {
00077 #elif defined   (  __GNUC__  )
00078 typedef struct __packed _MSC_CSW {
00079 #elif defined   (  __IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__  )
00080 typedef __packed struct _MSC_CSW {
00081 #endif
00082   uint32_t dSignature;
00083   uint32_t dTag;
00084   uint32_t dDataResidue;
00085   uint8_t  bStatus;
00086 } MSC_CSW;
00087 
00088 #define MSC_CBW_Signature               0x43425355
00089 #define MSC_CSW_Signature               0x53425355
00090 
00091 
00092 /* CSW Status Definitions */
00093 #define CSW_CMD_PASSED                  0x00
00094 #define CSW_CMD_FAILED                  0x01
00095 #define CSW_PHASE_ERROR                 0x02
00096 
00097 
00098 /* SCSI Commands */
00099 #define SCSI_TEST_UNIT_READY            0x00
00100 #define SCSI_REQUEST_SENSE              0x03
00101 #define SCSI_FORMAT_UNIT                0x04
00102 #define SCSI_INQUIRY                    0x12
00103 #define SCSI_MODE_SELECT6               0x15
00104 #define SCSI_MODE_SENSE6                0x1A
00105 #define SCSI_START_STOP_UNIT            0x1B
00106 #define SCSI_MEDIA_REMOVAL              0x1E
00107 #define SCSI_READ_FORMAT_CAPACITIES     0x23
00108 #define SCSI_READ_CAPACITY              0x25
00109 #define SCSI_READ10                     0x28
00110 #define SCSI_WRITE10                    0x2A
00111 #define SCSI_VERIFY10                   0x2F
00112 #define SCSI_MODE_SELECT10              0x55
00113 #define SCSI_MODE_SENSE10               0x5A
00114

00116 #endif  /* __MSC_H__ */
